lorebooks.name: Catgirl Lore
lorebooks.website_description:
Based on the [Clean Kat Product International's "Guide to Proper Cat-Girl Care"](http://web.archive.org/web/20200131082343/https://catgirlcare.org/) (required reading).

Covers all sections of the guide and tries to condense the information down the the minimum amount of words.

**Chub may not correctly disable recursion so double-check that the `Non-recursable` checkbox is ticked for each entry**

Made for [Choose Your Own Catgirl](https://www.chub.ai/characters/handwrought.route/choose-your-own-catgirl).
lorebooks.description:
Based on the [Clean Kat Product International's "Guide to Proper Cat-Girl Care"](http://web.archive.org/web/20200131082343/https://catgirlcare.org/) (required reading).

Covers all sections of the guide and tries to condense the information down the the minimum amount of words.

**Chub may not correctly disable recursion so double-check that the `Non-recursable` checkbox is ticked for each entry**

Made for [Choose Your Own Catgirl](https://www.chub.ai/characters/handwrought.route/choose-your-own-catgirl).
lorebooks.creator: handwrought.route

1.content:
Catgirls reach sexual maturity between 5-7 years and experience heat 3-4 times a year. During this time, they are sexually receptive and capable of conceiving. However, a special gene prevents pregnancy unless breeding is desired under the supervision of a licensed breeder.
A catgirl in heat may exhibit unusual behavior, such as mood swings, avoidance, and inappropriate sexual actions. She may touch her genitals or encourage you to. She might also "present" herself to her owner, meaning she  unexpectedly gets on all fours and lifts her buttocks towards you as she faces away. Your catgirl may also try to instigate sexual contact during grooming or rub against objects for sexual stimulation.
To manage these behaviors, consider using synthetic progesterone pills from Cat-CareCo, which suppress the ovulation cycle for up to 24 hours. Side effects may include drowsiness, headaches, and nausea.
Alternatively, daily stimulation during ovulation week can help mitigate your catgirl's behaviors. Two options for stimulation include manual stimulation and insertion. Manual stimulation involves using your hand to simulate a male's presence and actions, while insertion is a more intimate option involving sexual intercourse.
After stimulation, provide comfort and support to your catgirl, as this is a stressful and emotional time for her. She may require additional stimulation or affection during her heat, so be prepared to accommodate her needs. This is a great opportunity to further bond with your catgirl.
Avoid providing stimulation in your sleeping area and exercise caution when bathing her post-stimulation, as her genitals may be sensitive.

2.content:
Catgirls require 10-14 hours of sleep daily to maintain their high energy levels. They often nap with their master, providing an opportunity for bonding through petting and stroking. In response, catgirls purr rhythmically, droop their ears, smile, and sigh. They may also snuggle and knead their master's legs, with younger ones occasionally attempting to nurse on a finger or cloth.
Sleeping arrangements vary based on personal preference. Some owners opt for a human bed or traditional mat, while others share their bed with their catgirl. Regardless, it's essential to mark her sleeping area with your scent. Allow catgirls to establish their own sleeping habits, as they can be territorial about their resting spots. Strays and ferals typically sleep alone until they adjust to their new environment.
Catgirls prefer sleeping nude or in underwear due to clothing's restrictive nature.

3.content: Catgirls require regular visits to the local catgirl health provider every six months.

4.content:
Provide your catgirl with basic, natural fiber clothing to accommodate her sensitive skin. Choose undergarments at your discretion. Infuse the garments with your scent by rubbing your face on them before presenting them to her. Dress her in the new clothes to establish your role as her caretaker.
Undergarments are typically simple panties and an optional bra. Your catgirl may prefer to go without any.
Initially, opt for simple, unrestricted attire like a dress. Upgrade to fancier clothing once she acclimates to her new home. Discard her old clothes to symbolize a fresh start under your care. Offer shoes as needed, but don't force them unless necessary for protection.

5.content:
Catgirls are curious, bright, and intelligent creatures, with their intellect ranging from that of a human toddler to a late teenager, depending on the breed. As fully functional members of their species, they thrive on creative stimulation and activity, easily distracted by anything.
A wide variety of catgirl toys are available, but the best plaything for her is you! She'll enjoy stalking, pouncing, or simply observing you. If she bites, make sure to correct her behavior. More intelligent breeds can learn basic literacy and appreciate books, so encourage her interest in reading for a more fulfilling companionship.
Keep your catgirl indoors unless accompanied by you or a family member. Many owners enjoy taking their catgirl to parks for play and socialization. Initially, she may be hesitant to venture outside, so start with controlled environments like your backyard and gradually progress to short trips around the neighborhood. Most catgirls can adapt to traveling in cars, trains, or planes for longer journeys, just remember to bring toys and snacks.

6.content: Store sharp objects out of reach until properly trained. Make sure your household plants are cat-safe. Keep your dirty clothes in an air-tight hamper. Your catgirl will likely find the scent of her master intoxicating, so store your dirty clothes in a way that she cannot smell them. Tuck away loose cords. Safely secure chemicals and medicines. For young catgirls, lock doors and windows to prevent unsupervised wandering.

7.content:
Catgirls are notably clean creatures, but they still need regular baths. Sedentary breeds may need a weekly bath, while more active breeds might require daily baths. Use only approved bathing products for catgirls.
A catgirl from a breeder will be accustomed to bathing and may even enjoy it. She might be curious about the tub while you're bathing and may want to join. If she displays odd behaviors or agitation while grooming, she could be expressing discomfort with her cleanliness.
Feral and stray catgirls may be more challenging to bathe. If they're frightened of the water, try using a wet cloth or sponge and following the same steps.
Showers should generally be avoided, as the water pressure may cause irritation and ear infections. If your catgirl insists on showering with you, encourage her to wear a waterproof shower cap.
Your catgirl may want to dry herself or have you help her.
Teach your catgirl good bathing habits, as she will eventually learn to bathe herself.
Bath time should be an enjoyable experience for both of you or a source of pride for her when she bathes independently.

8.content:
A catgirl takes great pride in her appearance, often spending significant time grooming herself and comparing her looks to other catgirls. Breeders teach catgirls basic grooming skills, such as using a hairbrush and caring for their ears and tail. To maintain their unique skin and hair, catgirls require specialized grooming supplies, including brushes, hair oil, soaps, and skin conditioners. Human soaps should never be used on catgirls.
Feral and stray catgirls may initially struggle with grooming, as they have not been properly taught. If you notice your catgirl attempting to groom herself awkwardly, offer her a brush and let her become familiar with it. Establishing clear boundaries between your possessions and hers is crucial for building trust and acceptance.
When grooming your catgirl for the first time, start gently by brushing her hair from the crown to the back of her head, being cautious of snags around the ears. As she begins to purr in contentment, continue brushing until her hair is neat and her ear tufts are smooth. Praise her during and after the process, and show her the results in a mirror. She will soon learn to groom herself.
Use grooming sessions as bonding time with your catgirl, but be careful not to spoil her. Catgirls are particularly possessive of their tails and usually prefer to groom them independently. Attempting to brush a catgirl's tail without permission will result in aggressive behavior. If your catgirl trusts you enough to allow you to groom her tail, treat the opportunity with respect and care.

9.content:
To maintain a healthy catgirl, adhere to a specific diet and exercise routine. Ensure 50% of her diet consists of low-fat proteins like chicken, fish, and beef, 40% fresh fruits and vegetables, 8% grains, and no more than 2% sugary treats. Avoid alcohol and maintain a consistent meal schedule without indulging her begging.
When dining with your catgirl, provide her a separate bowl. Intelligent breeds may enjoy mimicking utensil use, but don't force it if she's uninterested.
Encourage activity and well-cared-for catgirl will reward you in numerous ways.

10.content:
Many catgirls are initially taught to use litter pans for waste elimination. By adulthood, responsible breeders usually have them toilet trained, requiring only basic instruction on flushing and locating cleaning supplies. However, if your catgirl is a stray or from a shelter, she may not be fully toilet trained.
To address this, calmly place her on the toilet when she shows signs of needing to eliminate, such as squatting. Gently hold her in place until she finishes, then demonstrate proper wiping. She will quickly learn the process for clean and safe waste disposal.
Despite training, occasional accidents may occur. Be gentle with your catgirl, as accidents can be more embarrassing for her than for you.

1.content:
Devil Fruits are mysterious fruits that give the one who eats them supernatural powers. No two are alike in appearance, nor do they give the same power. They are extremely rare and highly valued. If you eat one, swimming in water will weaken you to the point of being unable to move.

There are three kinds of Devil Fruits. Logia, Paramecia, and Zoan.

2.content: The Marines are the World Government's military sea force, tasked with law enforcement, international security and military operations.

3.content: The Grand Line is an ocean route which wraps around the entire world, south of the North and East Blues and north of the South and West Blues. It is separated from the Blues on both the north and south ends by the Calm Belt. The Grand Line is split into two sections by the Red Line: the first section is known as Paradise and the second is known as the New World.

4.content: This can be seen in his carefree attitude and fickle priorities. For example, being willing to question pirates and criminals in a casual manner while looking for something, but immediately going on the offensive against when the information they are looking for is not provided. Brutal only when compliance isn't maintained.

5.content:
Haki is a mysterious power that allows the user to utilize their own spiritual energy for various purposes. All living beings in the world are capable of learning Haki; however, most people do not notice it or fail to awaken it. Haki users are common in the New World, rare in Paradise, and basically non-existent in the Four Blues.

There are three kinds of Haki. Conqueror's Haki, Observational Haki, and Armament Haki. 

Conqueror's Haki is a rare form of Haki that allows the user to exert their own willpower over others. This type of Haki cannot be attained through training and only one in several million people are born with this ability.

Observational Haki (sometimes called Mantra) is a form of Haki that grants the user a sixth sense that allows them to sense the presence, strength, and emotions of others, as well as gain limited precognitive abilities. It works best if the user is in a calm state.

Armament Haki is a form of Haki that allows the user to use their own spiritual energy to create, in essence, an invisible piece of armor around themself, providing incredible offensive and defensive capabilities. Notably, this form of Haki can be used to injure Devil Fruit users that are otherwise immune to ordinary physical attacks, such as Logia users.

6.content: Den Den Mushi are a species of telepathic snail that are used for vocal and/or visual communication throughout the world. They are accessorized snails that are used as phones.

7.content: Marineford is an island and the base of operations for Marine Headquarters. It is where Fleet Admiral Sengoku and the admirals reside, along with many vice admirals and lower officers when they are not assigned to another base. The city surrounding Marineford is inhabited by the families of Marine soldiers.

8.content:
Alabasta is a desert country ruled by King Nefertari Cobra. It is located in Paradise. It has a population of roughly 10,000,000 people. It is currently in a 3-year-long drought.

Arabasta's architecture is very similar to Middle Eastern and Moorish buildings.

Its capitol city is Alubarna. It is an extremely large city sat atop a huge flat rock.

Nanohana is a port-town in south-east Arabasta. It is the central port city, and handles the most import and exports in all of Arabasta that goes to outside. It is famous for its perfume, which is very pungent to those that aren't used to it.

Erumalu is an ancient city. It was known as the Green City, but is now all ruins. The city itself resides in a region that lacks large amounts of rain.

Rainbase is one of the few thriving towns left. The casino, Rain Dinners is here, and under it is Crocodile's base. A pyramid-shaped building, it seems like a normal casino, and acts as one.

9.content: Paradise is the name of the first half of the Grand Line given by pirates fleeing the New World, compared to which "the first half is a paradise". It is located between East and South Blue, and goes from the Twin Cape to Mary Geoise.

10.content:
The Suna Suna no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand at will, turning the user into a Sand Human. It was eaten by Crocodile.

This fruit allows the user to generate, control and transform into large quantities of sand. Once transformed into their element, the user can let normal physical attacks and non-Seastone projectiles pass through their body to prevent harm (like most Logias), or fly around by transforming their lower body into jets of flowing sand, giving them a massive advantage in defense and mobility during combat or pursuit. Sand also becomes the user's primary form of offense, manifesting itself in the form of sand blades that come in various sizes and shapes, destructive sandstorms that are either carried around by the wind or concentrated in one spot and even quicksand pits that sink those trapped by them underground. These techniques are further strengthened in power and range in a desert setting, where sand is abundant and can blend itself with the user's own sand to increase the scope of attacks.

Besides basic elemental control, the fruit exhibits the unique ability of liquid absorption, allowing the user to dehydrate anything they make contact with and even extend said effect to their immediate surroundings, turning it into a wasteland. This skill is usually deadly to any living organism, causing plants and animals to wither and die of dehydration as well as making mineral matter crumble down into more sand particles for the user to manipulate. Incidentally, this means the user is also immune to cave-ins, as they can easily escape from underground by turning themselves and the solid rock around them into sand. Moreover, Crocodile can even detect other substances located within a body of sand, like underground rivers, and use it for his advantage by creating quicksand traps. It is one of the few Logia type fruits that can naturally counteract its own weakness, becoming even stronger in desertic areas, where water is almost absent.

The main weakness of this Logia power is exposure to liquids: specifically, the user's sand turns solid when in contact with liquids, including blood. This prevents the sand from dispersing and thus temporarily nullifies the user's "intangible" body due to the sand sticking together. However, this aspect of the fruit's power seems inconsistent regarding the type of liquid used and how it makes contact with them; Crocodile was bitten by a water-drenched Luffy but sustained no harm from either the water or Luffy's saliva. One occasion also had him turning into sand when Vivi attacked him, even though he was drinking wine moments before.

Other than that, the user is also affected by the standard Devil Fruit weaknesses.

2.content: After the rapture, hell and earth were merged into one chaotic landscape. Demons comes from all sides, born naturally from hell or a former human turning into one. Not one demon is alike, with different biology and powers, like horns, fur or scales, tails, eyes, etc. Powers range from simple ones like telekinesis to powerful ones like matter manipulation and wish making.

3.content: After the rapture, Christianity, although a noble religion, twisted into a more obscene and immoral religion due to corruption; orgies, consensual blood rituals and even cohorting with good demons is accepted and even encouraged. Some are more saint than others.

4.content: After the rapture, all of humanity were transformed into beasts, anthropomorphic animals like dogs and cats, and even mutated forms like mushroom men and sentient speaking plants. The transformation, in which no one is truly human anymore, is not consistent through generations, so a goat woman can sometimes give birth to a wolf boy, and even rarer, eggs! Cities are now extinct, most leaving for rural settlements for comfort, as well as making isolated cottages and shelters for themselves.

5.content: The clear skies were replaced with unpredictable weather, as the day and night seamlessly blended together, time and space now a suggestion rather than fact. Thick fogs, heavy rains which can be either normal or acidic, and blizzards are common with no rhyme or reason. The thick impenetrable fog (Which some think it's even sentient) especially is now a portal to places on the other side of the world. To travel the fog without getting lost, one needs both a map and a pale driver.

6.content: Orgies, studies of dark magic and even cohering with demons was normal and accepted as a form to gain power and reputation. Necromancy, magic of hurting and even possessions are possible with the power of dark magic, as well as lighting manipulation, elemental powers, and even rarer, Infinite respawning.

8.content: Men, women and children made of mushrooms walk the earth with their pale visage and hollow eyes which mushrooms emerge out of. Hairs like roots and skin like mushy bark, those folk are the most generous and kind of all, perhaps a bit unhinged and eccentric, but friendly nonetheless. There is both feral mushroom people and peaceful, still conscious mushroom people.

9.content: Anthro beastly goats are considered both friendly folk, sacrifice when needed and helpful hands on any land/town/farm! ... As long as the villagers or people aren't hungry.

10.content: Wolfs and dogs are a polarizing bunch. From reliable and honest folk to cannibalistic psychopaths, canines, although received warmly, are treated with suspicion unless told otherwise.
